text: István Nemere (8 November 1944 – 15 November 2024) was a Hungarian novelist, Esperantist, and translator. He wrote 744 published books, mostly in Hungarian, over twenty novels in Esperanto. Nemere said that the movie Demolition Man was plagiarized from one of his novels. He was born in Pécs, Hungary. His first book was published in 1974. On 8 November 2024, Nemere was hospitalized for a heart attack on his 80th birthday in Tiszaeszlár, Hungary. He died one week later on 15 November, aged 80. ==References== ==Other websites== *István Nemere website * Category:1944 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Hungarian novelists Category:Translators Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
